org.codice.ddf.ui.searchui.query.controller

Class AbstractEventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.ui.searchui.query.controller.AbstractEventController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityController, NotificationController

    @Service
public abstract class AbstractEventController
extends Object
implements org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler
    The AbstractEventController handles the processing and routing of events.

    • Method Detail

      • getSessionByUserId

        public org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession getSessionByUserId(String userId)
        Obtains the ServerSession associated with a given user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user associated with the ServerSession to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The ServerSession associated with the received userId or null if the user does not have an established ServerSession

      • deregisterUserSession

        @Listener(value="/meta/disconnect")
public void deregisterUserSession(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession serverSession,
                                                                      org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerMessage serverMessage)
        Listens to the /meta/disconnect Channel for clients disconnecting and deregisters the user. This should be invoked in order to remove AbstractEventController references to invalid ServerSessions.
        Parameters:
        serverSession - The ServerSession object associated with the client that is disconnecting
        serverMessage - The ServerMessage that was sent from the client on the /meta/disconnect Channel

      • adminCancelDownload

        public void adminCancelDownload(String userId,
                                String downloadIdentifier)
        Called by ddf.catalog.event.retrievestatus.DownloadStatusInfoImpl.cancelDownload to fire a cancel event.
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id assigned to the user who is downloading.
        downloadIdentifier - The randomly generated downloadId string assigned to the download at its start.

      • registerUserSession

        public void registerUserSession(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession serverSession,
                                org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerMessage serverMessage)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Enables private message delivery to a given user. As of CometD version 2.8.0, this must be called from the canHandshake method of a SecurityPolicy. See Obtaining user and session information for private message delivery for more information.
        Parameters:
        serverSession - The ServerSession on which to deliver messages to the user for the user.
        serverMessage - The ServerMessage containing the userId property with which to associate the ServerSession.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the received ServerSession or the ServerSession's id is null.

      • queuePersistedMessages

        protected void queuePersistedMessages(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession serverSession,

      • getControllerRootTopic

        public abstract String getControllerRootTopic()
        Obtains the root topic of the controller that should be used when registering the eventhandler.
        Returns:
        String representation of a root topic.
